basic.description:
General groups of plants used for food, fibre, shelter and pleasure. The plant parts that are used and the conversion of these to consumer products will be surveyed.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;24O;60P)
basic.subject: BIOL
basic.title: Plants for People

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     BIOL102 and BIOL103 and BIOL201.
